Bijo Sebastian


I am an Assistant Professor of the Engineering Design Department and currently heading the Autonomous Systems Laboratory at Indian Institute of Technology, Madras.

My research interests include use of Exoskeleton devices for medical rehabilitation as well as developing autonomous navigation solutions for Mobile Robots.

Google Scholar, LinkedIn, GitHub
